A2 Bushfire Risk Attribution Dataset

Source: R/a2_bushfire.R, R/data_doc.R
a2_bushfire.Rd

Synthetic dataset representing bushfire risk indicators across 1900–2020.

Synthetic dataset for Assignment 2 (ETC5523) showing indicators of bushfire risk.

a2_bushfire

a2_bushfire

Format

A tibble with 121 rows and 4 variables:

year

Year of observation (1900–2020)

FWI

Fire Weather Index — higher = more dangerous

TX7x

7-day mean of daily max temperature (°C)

Rain_mm

Annual rainfall (mm)

A tibble with 121 rows and 4 variables:

year

Numeric year (1900–2020)

FWI

Fire Weather Index

TX7x

7-day running mean of daily maximum temperature

Rain_mm

Annual rainfall in mm

Source

ETC5523 Assignment 2
